nodes.text: Legacy 25: The Hidden Temple, Part 1 is the twenty-fifth issue of the Star Wars: Legacy comic series.
Danger comes to the most secret location in the galaxy in this first part of a new story!

There is a place, hidden to all but a select few, where some of the most powerful figures in the galaxy reside. As Cade Skywalker travels there with a mission of upmost importance, an undetected pursuer may put Cade's clandestine destination at terrible risk!
Discover the Hidden Temple. A place of peace and sanctuary—enter at your own risk!
